page.title: 15LIFE STYLES IN RATHFRILAND
page.content: * TEENAGE FASHION * _________________ IN THE LAST NUMBER OF YEARS, TEENAGE FASHION HAS CHANGED FREQUENTLY. TEENAGE GIRLS WEAR LONG, BAGGY SHIRTS WITH 3/4 LENGTH TROUSERS. THERE ARE MANY STYLES POPULAR AT THE MOMENT INCLUDING CHECKED SHIRTS, LEATHER TIES, LONG, STRAIGHT SKIRTS AND JUMPERS WITH 'V' SHAPED BACKS. TEENAGE CASUAL WEAR TYPICALLY CONSISTS OF WHITE SHOES OR BOOTS, BAGGY TROUSERS AND SWEATSHIRTS. SPORTSWEAR HAS BECOME VERY POPULAR WITH PEOPLE WHO GO TO DISCOS AND TRENDY HAIRSTYLES INCLUDE STREAKS, SPIKES AND BOBS.
